RelatedSentence: Patricia Franklin Bell , 26 , was the mother of a 3 - year - old boy and worked as a security officer at Denver 's Stapleton International Airport .
On the morning of March 25 , 1976 , a co-worker of Bell 's who was concerned about her welfare went to the home and found Bell and Churchill dead of multiple stab wounds .

RelatedSentence: An autopsy report showed that Bell had been stabbed or cut more than 100 times .
Ned Lottie , a convicted felon who described himself as Bell 's boyfriend , went on trial for the murders , but the jury was deadlocked and the judge declared a mistrial .
